title: Lesson 27
paragraph: Ethics and standards shape behavior and performance. Leaders who emphasize moral conduct and follow established guidelines foster trust and reliability.

words.meaning: to comment on issues of right and wrong
words.example: He tends to moralize about small mistakes.
She did a decent job on the report.

words.meaning: a person in charge or guiding others
words.example: She is a respected community leader.

words.meaning: to give special importance to something
words.example: The teacher emphasized the key points.

words.meaning: to increase in size or scope
words.example: The company plans to expand into new markets.

words.meaning: the edge or difference in amount
words.example: The margin of error was small.
The laboratory is facilityful for experiments.
